article_text:
The state will now contract with companies and networks of doctors and hospitals

‘This is going to be much more consistent quality care and much more consistent budgeting’

Only one Democrat attended Wednesday’s ceremony

article_metadata.news-keywords: Medicaid, privatization, reform, overhaul, Pat McCrory
article_metadata.description: Gov. Pat McCrory signed a major overhaul of the state’s Medicaid system into law Wednesday.
article_metadata.title: McCrory signs Medicaid privatization bill | News & Observer
